alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:03PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Indian River and Brevard Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from Cape Canaveral to Palm Bay. Additional strong thunderstorms were developing over Indian River County. Movement was east between 15 to 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Rockledge, Sebastian, and Cocoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
